Configuration Platform SDK 9.0 API Reference

CfgChargeType

Values

Mnemonic ID Flag Short Description Log Name Long Description
CFGNoChargeType 0 0 'Unknown Charge Type' Unknown The value of the corresponding parameter has not changed.
CFGFree 1 0 'Free' Free The service is provided free of charge.
CFGFlatRate 2 0 'Flat Rate' FlatRate Flat-rate charging.
CFGInstance 3 0 'Instance' Instance Instance-based charging.
CFGDuration 4 0 'Duration' Duration Duration-based charging.
